resources.string: Welcome to Notify! With Notify, your LIFX bulb will flash whenever you get a new notification. To get started, swipe.
Change the LIFX API Key used to control your LIFX bulbs
Allow Notify to know when you receive a new notification
Change the colors used for certain apps
Change how many breath cycles are used when you receive a notification
Now, let\'s enable Notification Read Privileges for Notify. Below tap the Read Privileges button and check the box next to Notify.
First, enter your LIFX API key so we can control your LIFX bulbs. If you don\'t have an API key, you can get one at cloud.lifx.com/settings.
Great job! You\'re done. You can modify these settings at any time by coming back to the app. Other features like App Specific Coloring can also be enabled by coming back to the app.
Note: Actual colors displayed on LIFX bulbs may vary.
The setup was not completed successfully. Please make sure you enabled Notification Read Privileges for Notify and entered a valid API key.
